Tunable.name: KID_TO_KID_BED_MULTIPLIER
Tunable.description: When trying to populate a lot if lot has a kids bed and household has a kid in it. This multiplier will be applied to the weight of household when selecting household to move in.

TunableList.name: NUM_BEDS_TO_IDEAL_HOUSEHOLD_CURVE
TunableList.display: Num Beds To Ideal Household Curve
TunableList.description: Based on the number of beds and the number of sims in the household, a multiplier will be applied to the household to determine if household will be selected and added to zone.

TunableList.name: REGION_TO_HOUSEHOLD_POPULATION_DATA
TunableList.description: Mapping of Region Description ID to household population data. This is used to fill households for the different type of regions.

TunableTuple.name: Household Population Data
TunableTuple.description: Contains data required to fill neighborhood with sims.

TunableList.name: household_description_to_lot_data
TunableList.description: Mapping of House Description ID to household templates and weight. This is used to fill households for the different type of regions and acts as the default if the player has not visited the lot before.

TunableTuple.name: Household Templates
TunableTuple.description: The default data used for this lot if the player has never visited it.

Tunable.name: has_double_beds
Tunable.description: If the lot has double beds.

Tunable.name: has_kids_beds
Tunable.description: If the lot has kids beds.

Tunable.name: total_beds
Tunable.description: The total number of beds on this lot.

TunableList.name: household_description_to_templates
TunableList.description: Mapping of House Description ID to household templates and weight. This is used to fill households for the different type of regions.

Tunable.name: household_template
Tunable.description: Household template that will be created for neighborhood population

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: Weight of this template being chosen.

Tunable.name: RELATIONSHIP_DEPTH_WEIGHT
Tunable.description: Multiplier used to modify relationship depth to determine how important depth is in weight. The higher the multiplier the more relationship depth is added to weight score. The lower the weight the less likely household will be moved in.

Tunable.name: RELATIONSHIP_TRACK_MULTIPLIER
Tunable.description: Multiply the number of tracks by this multiplier to provide an additional score to determine if household should be moved in. The higher the multiplier the more the number of tracks bonus is added to weight. The lower the weight the less likely household will be moved in.

TunableList.name: RELATIONSHIP_UTILITY_CURVE
TunableList.description: Based on the relationship score for a household apply a multiplier to weight for determining score for moving household in.

Tunable.name: SIGNIFICANT_OTHER_MULTIPLIER
Tunable.description: When trying to populate a lot and if lot has a double bed and household contains a pair of sims that are considered significant other. This multiplier will be applied to the weight of household when selecting household to move in.
